title: 6: No Such Thing As One Direction in North Korea
content: This week in the QI Office Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing), Molly Oldfield (@mollyoldfield) and special guest Ig Nobel Prizes Founder Marc Abrahams (@marcabrahams) gather round a microphone to share their favourite newly discovered facts from the last days.
